id: AI Artwork Organizer - preloaded with 50+ high quality prompt
name: AI Artwork Organizer - preloaded with 50+ high quality prompt
description: Do you need a way to store prompts and images so you can quickly go back to them? Or a way to catalog your beautiful creations? This gallery-style organizer is the tool.Features:Shuffling gallery view.Document prompt, negative prompt, and other parameters. Preloaded with 50+ high-quality prompts with images.Organize with category, tag, and favorite.Create a share link to the album.Here's what the gallery looks likeDemo for adding new artwork: FAQsDoes this work with the free version of Notion?Ye
